title: Watts 5K Turkey Trot 2015
desc: Come to the 4th Annual Watts Turkey Trot 5K! Come join the Watts Healthy Farmers Market to kick start the holiday season by walking/running a 5K race around Ted Watkins Park (4 times around)! Registration begins at 8AM and the race starts at 9AM! Look for the Kaiser Permanente tents, we will be located at Ted Watkins Park, facing 103rd Street.? Remember to stay after the race! There will be other activities for you and?your family.? For questions or ways to get involved, contact Ignacio Vazquez Cano at 323.564.7911.
